Name: Act of Violets
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Silky berry fruit fortified with gin and balanced with lemon juice and dry vermouth.
History: Created in 2009 by Ryan Chetiyawardana at Bramble Bar and Lounge in Edinburgh, Scotland. Originally based on Martin Miller's Gin, this cocktail won the brand's UK Lost and Stolen competition.
Nutrition: One serving of Act of Violets contains 206 calories
